oai_dc:dc.dc:title: “The voice of organic farmers in Europe” Feb 2012, filmed in Nuremberg, 25 minutes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Medernach, Katy
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farm economics
Markets and trade
Networks and ownership
Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 15 voices from European organic farmers organisations. They speak of why they are farmers, of the need for more farmers, of the problems of development, of the struggle for survival in the face of mass marketing, of the efforts to organise local marketing, of the aberrant effects of certain European subsidies, of the need for organic farmers to organise, for their voice to be heard, of the need for cooperation rather than competition between farmers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Medernach, Katy (2013) “The voice of organic farmers in Europe” Feb 2012, filmed in Nuremberg, 25 minutes. FNAB, FNAB website.
